metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5836 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
The plist_free_data function in plist.c in libplist allows attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via vectors involving an integer node that is treated as a PLIST_KEY and then triggers an invalid free.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-5836` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplist++3v5 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist-utils - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist3 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
python3-plist - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libplist package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3').
